DOC.brief_summary: to compare efficacy and safety of Xalacom with the combination of unfixed Latanoprost and Timolol in subjects with open-angel glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Xalacom And Combination Of Unfixed Latanoprost And Timolol In Subjects With Open-Angle Glaucoma Or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: patients with openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension closed/barely open anterior chamber angle or a history of acute angel closure glaucoma Ocular surgery within 3 months
